mapper.select: SELECT DICT.DICT_CODE FROM P_DICTIONARY_ORG ORG, DICT_MAPPING MA, P_DICTIONARY DICT WHERE ORG.DICT_ID = MA.ORG_DICT_ID AND MA.DICT_ID = DICT.DICT_ID AND ORG.DICTTYPE_ID = '${dictTypeId}' AND ORG.DICT_CODE = '${dictCode}' AND ORG.ORG_CODE = '${orgCode}'
SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM P_MASTER_DATA WHERE CODE = #{code}
SELECT MD.MD_CODE FROM ${mdTableName} MD, ${orgTableName} ORG_MD WHERE ORG_MD.M_ID = MD.ID_ AND ORG_MD.MD_CODE = '${orgMDCode}' AND ORG_MD.ORG_CODE = '${orgCode}'
